wikipedia_page.main: Johnny Lewis (born 25 December 1958) is a DJ who has broadcast across numerous radio stations in his career including Radio Caroline and the KMFM stations.

response: It too lost its identity in 1998 when it became Capital Gold. As Invicta Supergold, the station performed very well and became home to ex Invicta FM presenters such as ex-breakfast presenter Johnny Lewis.
* Johnny Lewis (went to TLR then KMFM)and now Academy FM (Thanet) & Radio Caroline
Johnny Lewis (1983–2012) was an American actor.
Johnny Lewis may also refer to:
*Johnny Lewis (baseball) (1939–2018), baseball player, coach, scout, and manager
Former presenters include Doc Atherton, Tony Blackburn, Nigel Harris, Dominic King. Johnny Lewis, Tom Lowe, Dave Pearce, Myma Seldon, Benedict Smith and Melanie Sykes.
